name: LIK WAI NG (Nick)
title: Frontend React Developer
summary: Frontend React Developer 3 years of Frontend React Developer experienced in building web, mobile and desktop applications with React.js, Node.js and electron.js. Skilled in producing clean, well-documented, and collaborative team-friendly code. Key achievement: developed 25+ NodeJS applications.

experience.title: Frontend Engineer (Volunteer)
details: Developed responsive UI/UX such as search pages and bank rating views using VueJS, implementing reusable components.
Improved web performance by implementing server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SGR), lazy loading, caching, and code splitting.
Integrated Prismic CMS to manage dynamic content without code changes.

experience.title: Full-stack Developer
experience.summary: Achievement:   Moved up ranking to #9 in education website of HK
details: Developed populate public exam progressive web app, mobile app and desktop app by React, React Native, with 40M+ visit.
Reduced loading time by 40% and enhancing user experience by implementing various AWS solutions, including CloudFront, S3, and Redis.
Optimized SEO by 40% through improved metadata, structured content.
Integrated Google Cloud API to service (e.g map API, Recaptcha...).
Improved code quality by implementing ESLint, Prettier, and Husky for automated checks, and writing clear documentation to support team adoption.
Established infrastructure with 10+ AWS services and automated deployment by GitHub Action and Yarn.
Created 30+ VueJS UI/UX pages and components design with Figma.
Improved application robustness with TypeScript.
Tested React components with Jest and React Testing Library.
Documented technical specifications and meeting notes in Notion.

experience.title: Freelance Programmer
experience.summary: Achievement:   Delivered 10+ commercial projects with pixel perfect standard
details: Developed, and maintained an cross-browser e-commerce platform with 50k+ daily active users with NextJS, VueJS.
Utilized modern authentication techniques including JWT (JSON Web Token) for secure user sessions and access control.
Designed backend, database by modern technology (e.g NestJS, Laravel & MongoDB, Flux, Redux).
Deployed applications via NGINX, Apache, and Jenkins CI/CD pipelines.
Implemented internationalisation (i18n) support

experience.title: Analyst Programmer
experience.summary: Achievement:   Developed Child Health Service Booking System
details: Developed ReactJS frontend and Java-based RESTful API backend medical applications, serving medical staffs from 100+ health centers & 7M+ citizens.
Maintained shared services, including clinic reports, and improved complex SQL query performance by 10%.
Developed websites adhering to AAA accessibility standards.
Monitored system health status in dashboard integrated with Elastic.
